11 #ifndef EPWM_H
12 #define EPWM_H
13

17 // have a C binding.

19 //*****************************************************************************
20 #ifdef __cplusplus
21 extern "C"
22 {
23 #endif
24 
25 //*****************************************************************************
26 //
29 //
30 //*****************************************************************************
31 
32 #include <stdbool.h>
33 #include <stdint.h>
34 #include "inc/hw_memmap.h"
35 #include "inc/hw_types.h"
36 #include "inc/hw_epwm.h"
37 #include "cpu.h"
38 #include "debug.h"

40 
41 //*****************************************************************************
42 //
43 // Address offsets from EPWM_BASE to XCMP, MINDB and DE register memory maps
44 //
45 //*****************************************************************************
46 #define EPWM_O_XCMP 0x0400U
47 #define EPWM_O_DE 0x0800U
48 #define EPWM_O_MINDB 0x0C00U
49 
50 //*****************************************************************************
51 //
52 // Defines for the API.
53 //
54 //*****************************************************************************
55 //*****************************************************************************
56 //
57 // Define to specify mask for source parameter for
58 // EPWM_enableSyncOutPulseSource() & EPWM_disableSyncOutPulseSource()
59 //
60 //*****************************************************************************
61 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_SOURCE_M ((uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_SWEN |\
62  (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_ZEROEN |\
63  (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPBEN |\
64  (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPCEN |\
65  (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPDEN |\
66  (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_DCAEVT1EN |\
67  (uint16_t)EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_DCBEVT1EN)
68 
69 //*****************************************************************************
70 //
71 // Values that can be passed to EPWM_enableSyncOutPulseSource() &
72 // EPWM_disableSyncOutPulseSource() as the \e mode parameter.
73 //
74 //*****************************************************************************
76 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_SOFTWARE EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_SWEN
78 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_CNTR_ZERO EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_ZEROEN
80 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_CNTR_COMPARE_B EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPBEN
82 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_CNTR_COMPARE_C EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPCEN
84 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_CNTR_COMPARE_D EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_CMPDEN
86 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_DCA_EVT1_SYNC EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_DCAEVT1EN
88 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_DCB_EVT1_SYNC EPWM_SYNCOUTEN_DCBEVT1EN
90 #define EPWM_SYNC_OUT_PULSE_ON_ALL EPWM_SYNC_OUT_SOURCE_M
91 
92 //
93 // Time Base Module
94 //
95 //*****************************************************************************
96 //
99 //
100 //*****************************************************************************
101 typedef enum
102 {
104  EPWM_EMULATION_STOP_AFTER_NEXT_TB = 0,
106  EPWM_EMULATION_STOP_AFTER_FULL_CYCLE = 1,
108  EPWM_EMULATION_FREE_RUN = 2
109 } EPWM_EmulationMode;
110

112 //
115 //
116 //*****************************************************************************

118 {
119  EPWM_COUNT_MODE_DOWN_AFTER_SYNC = 0,
120  EPWM_COUNT_MODE_UP_AFTER_SYNC = 1
121 } EPWM_SyncCountMode;
122

128 //*****************************************************************************

134  EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_8 = 3,
135  EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_16 = 4,
136  EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_32 = 5,
137  EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_64 = 6,
138  EPWM_CLOCK_DIVIDER_128 = 7
139 } EPWM_ClockDivider;

160 //*****************************************************************************

166 typedef enum
167 {
169  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_DISABLE = 0x0,
171  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM1 = 0x1,
173  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM2 = 0x2,
175  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM3 = 0x3,
177  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM4 = 0x4,
179  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM5 = 0x5,
181  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM6 = 0x6,
183  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM7 = 0x7,
185  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM8 = 0x8,
187  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM9 = 0x9,
189  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM10 = 0xA,
191  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM11 = 0xB,
193  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM12 = 0xC,
195  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM13 = 0xD,
197  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM14 = 0xE,
199  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM15 = 0xF,
201  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM16 = 0x10,
203  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP1 = 0x11,
205  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP2 = 0x12,
207  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP3 = 0x13,
209  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP4 = 0x14,
211  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP5 = 0x15,
213  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP6 = 0x16,
215  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_ECAP7 = 0x17,
217  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_INPUTXBAR_OUT5 = 0x18,
219  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_INPUTXBAR_OUT6 = 0x19,
221  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_ETHERCAT_SYNC0 = 0x1A,
223  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_ETHERCAT_SYNC1 = 0x1B,
225  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM17 = 0x1C,
227  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_SYNCOUT_EPWM18 = 0x1D,
229  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_FSIRXA_TRIG1 = 0x1E,
231  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_FSIRXB_TRIG1 = 0x1F,
233  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_FSIRXC_TRIG1 = 0x20,
235  EPWM_SYNC_IN_PULSE_SRC_FSIRXD_TRIG1 = 0x21,
236 } EPWM_SyncInPulseSource;

484  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_ZERO = 0x3,
486  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_NO_CHANGE_PERIOD = 0x0,

508  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_DOWN_CMPA = 0xC0,

516  EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_TOGGLE_UP_CMPB = 0x300,

721 //
722 // Trip Zone
723 //
724 //*****************************************************************************
725 //
726 // Values that can be passed to EPWM_enableTripZoneSignals() and
727 // EPWM_disableTripZoneSignals() as the tzSignal parameter.
728 //
729 //*****************************************************************************
732 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC1 0x1U
735 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC2 0x2U
738 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC3 0x4U
741 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC4 0x8U
744 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC5 0x10U
747 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_CBC6 0x20U
750 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_DCAEVT2 0x40U
753 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_DCBEVT2 0x80U
756 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT1 0x100U
759 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT2 0x200U
762 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT3 0x400U
765 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT4 0x800U
768 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT5 0x1000U
771 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_OSHT6 0x2000U
774 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_DCAEVT1 0x4000U
777 #define EPWM_TZ_SIGNAL_DCBEVT1 0x8000U
778 
779 //*****************************************************************************
780 //
783 //
784 //*****************************************************************************
785 typedef enum
786 {
787  EPWM_TZ_DC_OUTPUT_A1 = 0,
788  EPWM_TZ_DC_OUTPUT_A2 = 3,
789  EPWM_TZ_DC_OUTPUT_B1 = 6,
790  EPWM_TZ_DC_OUTPUT_B2 = 9
791 } EPWM_TripZoneDigitalCompareOutput;

867  EPWM_TZ_ADV_ACTION_HIGH = 1,

1576 //*****************************************************************************
1577 //
1578 // Values that can be passed to EPWM_enableTripZoneInterrupt()and
1579 // EPWM_disableTripZoneInterrupt() as the tzInterrupt parameter .
1580 //
1581 //*****************************************************************************
1584 #define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_CBC 0x2U
1587 #define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_OST 0x4U
1590 #define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_DCAEVT1 0x8U
1593 #define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_DCAEVT2 0x10U
1596 #define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_DCBEVT1 0x20U
1599 #define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_DCBEVT2 0x40U
1602 #define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT_CAPEVT 0x80U
1603 
1604 //*****************************************************************************
1605 //
1606 // Values that can be returned by EPWM_getTripZoneFlagStatus() .
1607 //
1608 //*****************************************************************************
1611 #define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_CBC 0x2U
1614 #define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_OST 0x4U
1617 #define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_DCAEVT1 0x8U
1620 #define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_DCAEVT2 0x10U
1623 #define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_DCBEVT1 0x20U
1626 #define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_DCBEVT2 0x40U
1629 #define EPWM_TZ_FLAG_CAPEVT 0x80U
1630 
1631 //*****************************************************************************
1632 //
1633 // Value can be passed to EPWM_clearTripZoneFlag() as the
1634 // tzInterrupt parameter and returned by EPWM_getTripZoneFlagStatus().
1635 //
1636 //*****************************************************************************
1639 #define EPWM_TZ_INTERRUPT 0x1U
1640 
1641 //*****************************************************************************
1642 //
1643 // Values that can be passed to EPWM_clearCycleByCycleTripZoneFlag()
1644 // as the tzCbcFlag parameter and returned by
1645 // EPWM_getCycleByCycleTripZoneFlagStatus().
1646 //
1647 //*****************************************************************************
1650 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_1 0x1U
1653 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_2 0x2U
1656 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_3 0x4U
1659 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_4 0x8U
1662 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_5 0x10U
1665 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_6 0x20U
1668 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_DCAEVT2 0x40U
1671 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_DCBEVT2 0x80U
1674 #define EPWM_TZ_CBC_FLAG_CAPEVT 0x100U
1675 
1676 //*****************************************************************************
1677 //
1678 // Values that can be passed to EPWM_clearOneShotTripZoneFlag() as
1679 // the tzCbcFlag parameter and returned by the
1680 // EPWM_getOneShotTripZoneFlagStatus() .
1681 //
1682 //*****************************************************************************
1685 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_OST1 0x1U
1688 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_OST2 0x2U
1691 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_OST3 0x4U
1694 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_OST4 0x8U
1697 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_OST5 0x10U
1700 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_OST6 0x20U
1703 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_DCAEVT1 0x40U
1706 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_DCBEVT1 0x80U
1709 #define EPWM_TZ_OST_FLAG_CAPEVT 0x100U
1710

2396 //*****************************************************************************
2397 //
2398 // Functions APIs shared with HRPWM module
2399 //
2400 //*****************************************************************************
2401 
2402 //
2403 // Period Control related API
2404 //
2405 #define EPWM_setSyncPulseSource HRPWM_setSyncPulseSource
2406 
2407 //*****************************************************************************
2408 //
2409 // Prototypes for the API.
2410 //
2411 //*****************************************************************************
2412 
2413 //*****************************************************************************
2414 //
2424 //
2425 //*****************************************************************************
2426 #ifdef DEBUG
2427 __attribute__((always_inline))
2428 static inline bool EPWM_isBaseValid(uint32_t base)
2429 {
2430  return(
2431  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM1_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2432  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM2_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2433  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM3_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2434  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM4_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2435  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM5_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2436  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM6_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2437  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM7_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2438  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM8_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2439  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM9_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2440  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM10_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2441  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM11_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2442  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM12_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2443  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM13_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2444  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM14_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2445  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM15_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2446  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM16_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2447  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM17_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2448  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM18_BASE_FRAME(0U))
2449  ||
2450 
2451  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM1XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2452  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM2XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2453  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM3XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2454  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM4XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2455  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM5XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2456  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM6XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2457  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM7XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2458  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM8XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2459  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM9XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2460  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM10XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2461  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM11XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2462  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM12XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2463  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM13XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2464  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM14XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2465  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM15XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2466  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM16XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2467  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM17XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U)) ||
2468  ((base & BASE_ADDR_MASK) == EPWM18XLINK_BASE_FRAME(0U))
2469 
2470  );
2471 
2472 }
2473 #endif
2474 
2475 //
2476 // Time Base Sub Module related APIs
2477 //
2478 //*****************************************************************************
2479 //
2488 //
2489 //*****************************************************************************
2490 __attribute__((always_inline))
2491 static inline void
2492 EPWM_setTimeBaseCounter(uint32_t base, uint16_t count)
2493 {
2494  //
2495  // Check the arguments
2496  //
2497  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2498 
2499  //
2500  // Write to TBCTR register
2501  //
2502  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTR) = count;
2503 }
2504 
2505 //*****************************************************************************
2506 //
2519 //
2520 //*****************************************************************************
2521 __attribute__((always_inline))
2522 static inline void
2523 EPWM_setCountModeAfterSync(uint32_t base, EPWM_SyncCountMode mode)
2524 {
2525  //
2526  // Check the arguments
2527  //
2528  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2529 
2530  if(mode == EPWM_COUNT_MODE_UP_AFTER_SYNC)
2531  {
2532  //
2533  // Set PHSDIR bit
2534  //
2535  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) |= EPWM_TBCTL_PHSDIR;
2536  }
2537  else
2538  {
2539  //
2540  // Clear PHSDIR bit
2541  //
2542  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) &= ~EPWM_TBCTL_PHSDIR;
2543  }
2544 }
2545 
2546 //*****************************************************************************
2547 //
2567 //
2568 //*****************************************************************************
2569 __attribute__((always_inline))
2570 static inline void
2571 EPWM_setClockPrescaler(uint32_t base, EPWM_ClockDivider prescaler,
2572  EPWM_HSClockDivider highSpeedPrescaler)
2573 {
2574  //
2575  // Check the arguments
2576  //
2577  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2578 
2579  //
2580  // Write to CLKDIV and HSPCLKDIV bit
2581  //
2582  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) =
2583  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) &
2584  ~(EPWM_TBCTL_CLKDIV_M | EPWM_TBCTL_HSPCLKDIV_M)) |
2585  (((uint16_t)prescaler << EPWM_TBCTL_CLKDIV_S) |
2586  ((uint16_t)highSpeedPrescaler << EPWM_TBCTL_HSPCLKDIV_S)));
2587 } // convert to uint_8?
2588 
2589 //*****************************************************************************
2590 //
2600 //
2601 //*****************************************************************************
2602 __attribute__((always_inline))
2603 static inline void
2604 EPWM_forceSyncPulse(uint32_t base)
2605 {
2606  //
2607  // Check the arguments
2608  //
2609  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2610 
2611  //
2612  // Set SWFSYNC bit
2613  //
2614  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) |= EPWM_TBCTL_SWFSYNC;
2615 }
2616 
2617 //*****************************************************************************
2618 //
2642 //
2643 //*****************************************************************************
2644 __attribute__((always_inline))
2645 static inline void
2646 EPWM_setSyncInPulseSource(uint32_t base, EPWM_SyncInPulseSource source)
2647 {
2648  //
2649  // Check the arguments
2650  //
2651  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2652 
2653  //
2654  // Set EPWM Sync-In Source Mode.
2655  //
2656  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCINSEL) =
2657  (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCINSEL) & (~EPWM_SYNCINSEL_SEL_M)) |
2658  ((uint16_t)source & EPWM_SYNCINSEL_SEL_M);
2659 
2660 }
2661 //*****************************************************************************
2662 //
2694 //
2695 //*****************************************************************************
2696 __attribute__((always_inline))
2697 static inline void
2698 EPWM_enableSyncOutPulseSource(uint32_t base, uint16_t source)
2699 {
2700  //
2701  // Check the arguments
2702  //
2703  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2704  ASSERT(source <= EPWM_SYNC_OUT_SOURCE_M);
2705 
2706  //
2707  // Enable selected EPWM Sync-Out Sources.
2708  //
2709  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCOUTEN) = HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCOUTEN) |
2710  (uint16_t)source;
2711 
2712 }
2713 
2714 //*****************************************************************************
2715 //
2741 //
2742 //*****************************************************************************
2743 __attribute__((always_inline))
2744 static inline void
2745 EPWM_disableSyncOutPulseSource(uint32_t base, uint16_t source)
2746 {
2747  //
2748  // Check the arguments
2749  //
2750  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2751  ASSERT(source <= EPWM_SYNC_OUT_SOURCE_M);
2752 
2753  //
2754  // Disable EPWM Sync-Out Sources.
2755  //
2756  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCOUTEN) = HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCOUTEN) &
2757  ~((uint16_t)source);
2758 
2759 }
2760 //*****************************************************************************
2761 //
2775 //
2776 //*****************************************************************************
2777 __attribute__((always_inline))
2778 static inline void
2779 EPWM_setOneShotSyncOutTrigger(uint32_t base,
2780  EPWM_OneShotSyncOutTrigger trigger)
2781 {
2782  //
2783  // Check the arguments
2784  //
2785  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2786 
2787  //
2788  // Set source for One-Shot Sync-Out Pulse.
2789  //
2790  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL3) =
2791  (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL3) & ~(EPWM_TBCTL3_OSSFRCEN)) |
2792  (uint16_t)trigger;
2793 }
2794 
2795 //*****************************************************************************
2796 //
2809 //
2810 //*****************************************************************************
2811 __attribute__((always_inline))
2812 static inline void
2813 EPWM_setPeriodLoadMode(uint32_t base, EPWM_PeriodLoadMode loadMode)
2814 {
2815  //
2816  // Check the arguments
2817  //
2818  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2819 
2820  if(loadMode == EPWM_PERIOD_SHADOW_LOAD)
2821  {
2822  //
2823  // Clear PRDLD
2824  //
2825  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) &= ~EPWM_TBCTL_PRDLD;
2826  }
2827  else
2828  {
2829  //
2830  // Set PRDLD
2831  //
2832  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) |= EPWM_TBCTL_PRDLD;
2833  }
2834 }
2835 //*****************************************************************************
2836 //

2846 //*****************************************************************************

2849 EPWM_enablePhaseShiftLoad(uint32_t base)
2850 {

2852  // Check the arguments
2853  //
2854  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2855 
2856  //
2857  // Set PHSEN bit
2858  //
2859  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) |= EPWM_TBCTL_PHSEN;
2860 }
2861 //*****************************************************************************

2880 
2881  //
2882  // Clear PHSEN bit
2883  //
2884  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) &= ~EPWM_TBCTL_PHSEN;
2885 }
2886 //*****************************************************************************

2902 //*****************************************************************************
2903 __attribute__((always_inline))
2904 static inline void
2905 EPWM_setTimeBaseCounterMode(uint32_t base, EPWM_TimeBaseCountMode counterMode)
2906 {
2907  //
2908  // Check the arguments
2909  //
2910  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2911 
2912  //
2913  // Write to CTRMODE bit
2914  //
2915  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) =
2916  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) & ~(EPWM_TBCTL_CTRMODE_M)) |
2917  ((uint16_t)counterMode));
2918 }

2943 {

2948

2950  // Write to PRDLDSYNC bit
2951  //
2952  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL2) =
2953  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL2) & ~(EPWM_TBCTL2_PRDLDSYNC_M)) |
2954  ((uint16_t)shadowLoadMode << EPWM_TBCTL2_PRDLDSYNC_S));
2955 }

2978  //

2980 }

2994 EPWM_disableOneShotSync(uint32_t base)
2995 {
2996  //
2997  // Check the arguments
2998  //
2999  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3000 
3001  //
3002  // Clear OSHTSYNCMODE bit
3003  //
3004  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL2) &= ~EPWM_TBCTL2_OSHTSYNCMODE;
3005 }

3056 //*****************************************************************************

3066 //
3067 //*****************************************************************************
3068 __attribute__((always_inline))
3069 static inline bool
3070 EPWM_getTimeBaseCounterOverflowStatus(uint32_t base)
3071 {
3072  //
3073  // Check the arguments
3074  //
3075  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3076 
3077  //
3078  // Return true if CTRMAX bit is set, false otherwise
3079  //
3080  return(((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBSTS) & EPWM_TBSTS_CTRMAX) ==
3081  EPWM_TBSTS_CTRMAX));
3082 }

3106  //

3108 }
3109 //*****************************************************************************

3124 {

3131  // Return true if SYNCI bit is set, false otherwise
3132  //
3133  return(((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBSTS) & EPWM_TBSTS_SYNCI) ==
3134  EPWM_TBSTS_SYNCI));
3135 }

3215  //

3217 
3218 }

3239 {

3250 //*****************************************************************************
3251 //
3259 //
3260 //*****************************************************************************
3261 __attribute__((always_inline))
3262 static inline uint16_t
3263 EPWM_getTimeBasePeriod(uint32_t base)
3264 {
3265  //
3266  // Check the arguments
3267  //
3268  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3269

3271  // Read from TBPRD bit
3272  //

3274 }
3275 
3276 //*****************************************************************************
3277 //
3304 //
3305 //*****************************************************************************
3306 __attribute__((always_inline))
3307 static inline void
3308 EPWM_setCounterCompareShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
3309  EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule,
3310  EPWM_CounterCompareLoadMode loadMode)
3311 {
3312  uint16_t syncModeOffset;
3313  uint16_t loadModeOffset;
3314  uint16_t shadowModeOffset;
3315  uint32_t registerOffset;
3316 
3317  //
3318  // Check the arguments
3319  //
3320  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3321 
3322  if((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
3323  (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_C))
3324  {
3325  syncModeOffset = 10U;
3326  loadModeOffset = 0U;
3327  shadowModeOffset = 4U;
3328  }
3329  else
3330  {
3331  syncModeOffset = 12U;
3332  loadModeOffset = 2U;
3333  shadowModeOffset = 6U;
3334  }
3335 
3336  //
3337  // Get the register offset. EPWM_O_CMPCTL for A&B or
3338  // EPWM_O_CMPCTL2 for C&D
3339  //
3340  registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL + ((uint32_t)compModule & 0x1U) * 2U;
3341 
3342  //
3343  // Set the appropriate sync and load mode bits and also enable shadow
3344  // load mode. Shadow to active load can also be frozen.
3345  //
3346  HWREGH(registerOffset) = ((HWREGH(registerOffset) &
3347  ~((0x3U << syncModeOffset) | // Clear sync mode
3348  (0x3U << loadModeOffset) | // Clear load mode
3349  (0x1U << shadowModeOffset))) | // shadow mode
3350  ((((uint16_t)loadMode >> 2U) << syncModeOffset) |
3351  (((uint16_t)loadMode & 0x3U) << loadModeOffset)));
3352 }
3353 //*****************************************************************************
3354 //
3369 //
3370 //*****************************************************************************
3371 __attribute__((always_inline))
3372 static inline void
3373 EPWM_disableCounterCompareShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
3374  EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule)
3375 {
3376  uint16_t shadowModeOffset;
3377  uint32_t registerOffset;
3378 
3379  //
3380  // Check the arguments
3381  //
3382  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3383 
3384  if((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
3385  (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_C))
3386  {
3387  shadowModeOffset = 4U;
3388  }
3389  else
3390  {
3391  shadowModeOffset = 6U;
3392  }
3393 
3394  //
3395  // Get the register offset. EPWM_O_CMPCTL for A&B or
3396  // EPWM_O_CMPCTL2 for C&D
3397  //
3398  registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL + ((uint32_t)compModule & 0x1U) * 2U;
3399 
3400  //
3401  // Disable shadow load mode.
3402  //
3403  HWREGH(registerOffset) = (HWREGH(registerOffset) |
3404  (0x1U << shadowModeOffset));
3405 }
3406 //*****************************************************************************
3407 //
3423 //
3424 //*****************************************************************************
3425 __attribute__((always_inline))
3426 static inline void
3427 EPWM_setCounterCompareValue(uint32_t base, EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule,
3428  uint16_t compCount)
3429 {
3430  uint32_t registerOffset;
3431 
3432  //
3433  // Check the arguments
3434  //
3435  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3436 
3437  //
3438  // Get the register offset for the Counter compare
3439  //
3440  registerOffset = EPWM_O_CMPA + (uint32_t)compModule * 2U;
3441 
3442  //
3443  // Write to the counter compare registers.
3444  //
3445  if((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
3446  (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_B))
3447  {
3448  //
3449  // Write to COMPA or COMPB bits
3450  //
3451  HWREGH(base + registerOffset + 0x2U) = compCount;
3452  }
3453  else
3454  {
3455  //
3456  // Write to COMPC or COMPD bits
3457  //
3458  HWREGH(base + registerOffset) = compCount;
3459  }
3460 }
3461 //*****************************************************************************
3462 //
3476 //
3477 //*****************************************************************************
3478 __attribute__((always_inline))
3479 static inline uint16_t
3480 EPWM_getCounterCompareValue(uint32_t base, EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule)
3481 {
3482  uint32_t registerOffset;
3483  uint16_t compCount;
3484 
3485  //
3486  // Check the arguments
3487  //
3488  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3489 
3490  //
3491  // Get the register offset for the Counter compare
3492  //
3493  registerOffset = EPWM_O_CMPA + (uint32_t)compModule * 2U;
3494 
3495  //
3496  // Read from the counter compare registers.
3497  //
3498  if((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
3499  (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_B))
3500  {
3501  //
3502  // Read COMPA or COMPB bits
3503  //
3504  compCount = (uint16_t)((HWREG(base + registerOffset) &
3505  0xFFFF0000UL) >> 16U);
3506  }
3507  else
3508  {
3509  //
3510  // Read COMPC or COMPD bits
3511  //
3512  compCount = HWREGH(base + registerOffset);
3513  }
3514  return(compCount);
3515 }
3516 //*****************************************************************************
3517 //
3530 //
3531 //*****************************************************************************
3532 __attribute__((always_inline))
3533 static inline bool
3534 EPWM_getCounterCompareShadowStatus(uint32_t base,
3535  EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule)
3536 {
3537  //
3538  // Check the arguments
3539  //
3540  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3541 
3542  //
3543  // Check the validity of input.
3544  // COMPA and COMPB are valid input arguments.
3545  //
3546  ASSERT((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
3547  (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_B));
3548 
3549  //
3550  // Read the value of SHDWAFULL or SHDWBFULL bit
3551  //
3552  return((((HWREG(base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL) >>
3553  ((((uint16_t)compModule >> 1U) & 0x1U) + 8U)) &
3554  0x1U) == 0x1U));
3555 }
3556 //*****************************************************************************
3557 //
3566 //
3567 //*****************************************************************************
3568 __attribute__((always_inline))
3569 static inline void
3570 EPWM_enableLinkDutyHR(uint32_t base)
3571 {
3572  //
3573  // Check the arguments
3574  //
3575  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3576 
3577  //
3578  // Set LINKDUTYHR bit in CMPCTL register
3579  //
3580  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL) |= EPWM_CMPCTL_LINKDUTYHR;
3581 }
3582 //*****************************************************************************
3583 //
3592 //
3593 //*****************************************************************************
3594 __attribute__((always_inline))
3595 static inline void
3596 EPWM_disableLinkDutyHR(uint32_t base)
3597 {
3598  //
3599  // Check the arguments
3600  //
3601  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3602 
3603  //
3604  // Clear LINKDUTYHR bit in CMPCTL register
3605  //
3606  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL) &= ~EPWM_CMPCTL_LINKDUTYHR;
3607 }
3608 //
3609 // Action Qualifier module related APIs
3610 //
3611 //*****************************************************************************
3612 //
3639 //
3640 //*****************************************************************************
3641 __attribute__((always_inline))
3642 static inline void
3643 EPWM_setActionQualifierShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
3644  EPWM_ActionQualifierModule aqModule,
3645  EPWM_ActionQualifierLoadMode loadMode)
3646 {
3647  uint16_t syncModeOffset;
3648  uint16_t shadowModeOffset;
3649 
3650  //
3651  // Check the arguments
3652  //
3653  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3654 
3655  syncModeOffset = 8U + (uint16_t)aqModule;
3656  shadowModeOffset = 4U + (uint16_t)aqModule;
3657 
3658  //
3659  // Set the appropriate sync and load mode bits and also enable shadow
3660  // load mode. Shadow to active load can also be frozen.
3661  //
3662  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCTL) = ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCTL) &
3663  (~((0x3U << (uint16_t)aqModule) |
3664  (0x3U << (uint16_t)syncModeOffset))) |
3665  (0x1U << shadowModeOffset)) |
3666  ((((uint16_t)loadMode >> 2U) <<
3667  syncModeOffset) | (((uint16_t)loadMode &
3668  0x3U) << (uint16_t)aqModule)));
3669 }
3670 //*****************************************************************************
3671 //
3684 //
3685 //*****************************************************************************
3686 __attribute__((always_inline))
3687 static inline void
3688 EPWM_disableActionQualifierShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
3689  EPWM_ActionQualifierModule aqModule)
3690 {
3691  uint16_t shadowModeOffset;
3692 
3693  //
3694  // Check the arguments
3695  //
3696  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3697 
3698  shadowModeOffset = 4U + (uint16_t)aqModule;
3699 
3700  //
3701  // Disable shadow load mode. Action qualifier is loaded on
3702  // immediate mode only.
3703  //
3704  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCTL) &= ~(1U << shadowModeOffset);
3705 }
3706 //*****************************************************************************
3707 //
3726 //
3727 //*****************************************************************************
3728 __attribute__((always_inline))
3729 static inline void
3730 EPWM_setActionQualifierT1TriggerSource(uint32_t base,
3731  EPWM_ActionQualifierTriggerSource trigger)
3732 {
3733  //
3734  // Check the arguments
3735  //
3736  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3737 
3738  //
3739  // Set T1 trigger source
3740  //
3741  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQTSRCSEL) =
3742  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQTSRCSEL) & (~EPWM_AQTSRCSEL_T1SEL_M)) |
3743  ((uint16_t)trigger));
3744 }
3745 
3746 //*****************************************************************************
3747 //
3766 //
3767 //*****************************************************************************
3768 __attribute__((always_inline))
3769 static inline void
3770 EPWM_setActionQualifierT2TriggerSource(uint32_t base,
3771  EPWM_ActionQualifierTriggerSource trigger)
3772 {
3773  //
3774  // Check the arguments
3775  //
3776  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3777 
3778  //
3779  // Set T2 trigger source
3780  //
3781  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQTSRCSEL) =
3782  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQTSRCSEL) & (~EPWM_AQTSRCSEL_T2SEL_M)) |
3783  ((uint16_t)trigger << EPWM_AQTSRCSEL_T2SEL_S));
3784 }
3785 //*****************************************************************************
3786 //
3825 //
3826 //*****************************************************************************
3827 __attribute__((always_inline))
3828 static inline void
3829 EPWM_setActionQualifierAction(uint32_t base,
3830  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput,
3831  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutput output,
3832  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputEvent event)
3833 {
3834  uint32_t registerOffset;
3835  uint32_t registerTOffset;
3836 
3837  //
3838  // Check the arguments
3839  //
3840  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3841 
3842  //
3843  // Get the register offset
3844  //
3845  registerOffset = EPWM_O_AQCTLA + (uint32_t)epwmOutput * 2U;
3846  registerTOffset = EPWM_O_AQCTLA2 + (uint32_t)epwmOutput * 2U;
3847 
3848  //
3849  // If the event occurs on T1 or T2 events
3850  //
3851  if(((uint16_t)event & 0x1U) == 1U)
3852  {
3853  //
3854  // Write to T1U,T1D,T2U or T2D of AQCTLA2 register
3855  //
3856  HWREGH(base + registerTOffset) =
3857  ((HWREGH(base + registerTOffset) & ~(3U << ((uint16_t)event - 1U))) |
3858  ((uint16_t)output << ((uint16_t)event - 1U)));
3859  }
3860  else
3861  {
3862  //
3863  // Write to ZRO,PRD,CAU,CAD,CBU or CBD bits of AQCTLA register
3864  //
3865  HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
3866  ((HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~(3U << (uint16_t)event)) |
3867  ((uint16_t)output << (uint16_t)event));
3868  }
3869 }
3870 //*****************************************************************************
3871 //
3952 //
3953 //*****************************************************************************
3954 __attribute__((always_inline))
3955 static inline void
3956 EPWM_setActionQualifierActionComplete(uint32_t base,
3957  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput,
3958  uint16_t action)
3959 {
3960  uint32_t registerOffset;
3961 
3962  //
3963  // Check the arguments
3964  //
3965  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3966 
3967  //
3968  // Get the register offset
3969  //
3970  registerOffset = EPWM_O_AQCTLA + (uint32_t)epwmOutput * 2U;
3971 
3972  //
3973  // Write to ZRO, PRD, CAU, CAD, CBU or CBD bits of AQCTLA register
3974  //
3975  HWREGH(base + registerOffset) = (uint16_t)action;
3976 }
3977 //*****************************************************************************
3978 //
4036 //
4037 //*****************************************************************************
4038 __attribute__((always_inline))
4039 static inline void
4040 EPWM_setAdditionalActionQualifierActionComplete(uint32_t base,
4041  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput,
4042  uint16_t action)
4043 {
4044  uint32_t registerTOffset;
4045 
4046  //
4047  // Check the arguments
4048  //
4049  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4050 
4051  //
4052  // Get the register offset
4053  //
4054  registerTOffset = EPWM_O_AQCTLA2 + (uint32_t)epwmOutput * 2U;
4055 
4056  //
4057  // Write to T1U, T1D, T2U or T2D of AQCTLA2 register
4058  //
4059  HWREGH(base + registerTOffset) = (uint16_t)action;
4060 }
4061 //*****************************************************************************
4062 //
4081 //
4082 //*****************************************************************************
4083 __attribute__((always_inline))
4084 static inline void
4085 EPWM_setActionQualifierContSWForceShadowMode(uint32_t base,
4086  EPWM_ActionQualifierContForce mode)
4087 {
4088  //
4089  // Check the arguments
4090  //
4091  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4092 
4093  //
4094  // Set the Action qualifier software action reload mode.
4095  // Write to RLDCSF bit
4096  //
4097  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) =
4098  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) & ~EPWM_AQSFRC_RLDCSF_M) |
4099  ((uint16_t)mode << EPWM_AQSFRC_RLDCSF_S));
4100 }
4101 //*****************************************************************************
4102 //
4121 //
4122 //*****************************************************************************
4123 __attribute__((always_inline))
4124 static inline void
4125 EPWM_setActionQualifierContSWForceAction(uint32_t base,
4126  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput,
4127  EPWM_ActionQualifierSWOutput output)
4128 {
4129  //
4130  // Check the arguments
4131  //
4132  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4133 
4134  //
4135  // Initiate a continuous software forced output
4136  //
4137  if(epwmOutput == EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_A)
4138  {
4139  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCSFRC) =
4140  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCSFRC) & ~EPWM_AQCSFRC_CSFA_M) |
4141  ((uint16_t)output));
4142  }
4143  else
4144  {
4145  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCSFRC) =
4146  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCSFRC) & ~EPWM_AQCSFRC_CSFB_M) |
4147  ((uint16_t)output << EPWM_AQCSFRC_CSFB_S)) ;
4148  }
4149 }
4150 //*****************************************************************************
4151 //
4172 //
4173 //*****************************************************************************
4174 __attribute__((always_inline))
4175 static inline void
4176 EPWM_setActionQualifierSWAction(uint32_t base,
4177  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput,
4178  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutput output)
4179 {
4180  //
4181  // Check the arguments
4182  //
4183  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4184 
4185  //
4186  // Set the one time software forced action
4187  //
4188  if(epwmOutput == EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_A)
4189  {
4190  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) =
4191  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) & ~EPWM_AQSFRC_ACTSFA_M) |
4192  ((uint16_t)output));
4193  }
4194  else
4195  {
4196  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) =
4197  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) & ~EPWM_AQSFRC_ACTSFB_M) |
4198  ((uint16_t)output << EPWM_AQSFRC_ACTSFB_S));
4199  }
4200 }
4201 //*****************************************************************************
4202 //
4215 //
4216 //*****************************************************************************
4217 __attribute__((always_inline))
4218 static inline void
4219 EPWM_forceActionQualifierSWAction(uint32_t base,
4220  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput)
4221 {
4222  //
4223  // Check the arguments
4224  //
4225  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4226 
4227  //
4228  // Initiate a software forced event
4229  //
4230  if(epwmOutput == EPWM_AQ_OUTPUT_A)
4231  {
4232  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) |= EPWM_AQSFRC_OTSFA;
4233  }
4234  else
4235  {
4236  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQSFRC) |= EPWM_AQSFRC_OTSFB;
4237  }
4238 }
4239 //
4240 // Dead Band Module related APIs
4241 //
4242 //*****************************************************************************
4243 //
4262 //
4263 //*****************************************************************************
4264 __attribute__((always_inline))
4265 static inline void
4266 EPWM_setDeadBandOutputSwapMode(uint32_t base, EPWM_DeadBandOutput output,
4267  bool enableSwapMode)
4268 {
4269  uint16_t mask;
4270 
4271  //
4272  // Check the arguments
4273  //
4274  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4275 
4276  mask = (uint16_t)1U << ((uint16_t)output + EPWM_DBCTL_OUTSWAP_S);
4277 
4278  if(enableSwapMode)
4279  {
4280  //
4281  // Set the appropriate outswap bit to swap output
4282  //
4283  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) | mask);
4284  }
4285  else
4286  {
4287  //
4288  // Clear the appropriate outswap bit to disable output swap
4289  //
4290  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~mask);
4291  }
4292 }
4293 //*****************************************************************************
4294 //
4313 //
4314 //*****************************************************************************
4315 __attribute__((always_inline))
4316 static inline void
4317 EPWM_setDeadBandDelayMode(uint32_t base, EPWM_DeadBandDelayMode delayMode,
4318  bool enableDelayMode)
4319 {
4320  uint16_t mask;
4321 
4322  //
4323  // Check the arguments
4324  //
4325  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4326 
4327  mask = (uint16_t)1U << ((uint16_t)delayMode + EPWM_DBCTL_OUT_MODE_S);
4328 
4329  if(enableDelayMode)
4330  {
4331  //
4332  // Set the appropriate outmode bit to enable Dead Band delay
4333  //
4334  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) | mask);
4335  }
4336  else
4337  {
4338  //
4339  // Clear the appropriate outswap bit to disable output swap
4340  //
4341  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~ mask);
4342  }
4343 }
4344 //*****************************************************************************
4345 //
4363 //
4364 //*****************************************************************************
4365 __attribute__((always_inline))
4366 static inline void
4367 EPWM_setDeadBandDelayPolarity(uint32_t base,
4368  EPWM_DeadBandDelayMode delayMode,
4369  EPWM_DeadBandPolarity polarity)
4370 {
4371  uint16_t shift;
4372 
4373  //
4374  // Check the arguments
4375  //
4376  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4377 
4378  shift = (((uint16_t)delayMode ^ 0x1U) + EPWM_DBCTL_POLSEL_S);
4379 
4380  //
4381  // Set the appropriate polsel bits for dead band polarity
4382  //
4383  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4384  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~ (1U << shift)) |
4385  ((uint16_t)polarity << shift));
4386 }
4387 //*****************************************************************************
4388 //
4402 //
4403 //*****************************************************************************
4404 __attribute__((always_inline))
4405 static inline void
4406 EPWM_setRisingEdgeDeadBandDelayInput(uint32_t base, uint16_t input)
4407 {
4408  //
4409  // Check the arguments
4410  //
4411  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4412  ASSERT((input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_EPWMA) ||
4413  (input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_EPWMB));
4414 
4415  //
4416  // Set the Rising Edge Delay input
4417  //
4418  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4419  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~(1U << (EPWM_DBCTL_IN_MODE_S))) |
4420  (input << EPWM_DBCTL_IN_MODE_S));
4421 }
4422 //*****************************************************************************
4423 //
4440 //
4441 //*****************************************************************************
4442 __attribute__((always_inline))
4443 static inline void
4444 EPWM_setFallingEdgeDeadBandDelayInput(uint32_t base, uint16_t input)
4445 {
4446  //
4447  // Check the arguments
4448  //
4449  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4450  ASSERT((input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_EPWMA) ||
4451  (input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_EPWMB) ||
4452  (input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_DB_RED));
4453 
4454  if(input == EPWM_DB_INPUT_DB_RED)
4455  {
4456  //
4457  // Set the Falling Edge Delay input
4458  //
4459  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) |= EPWM_DBCTL_DEDB_MODE;
4460  }
4461  else
4462  {
4463  //
4464  // Set the Falling Edge Delay input
4465  //
4466  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) &= ~EPWM_DBCTL_DEDB_MODE;
4467 
4468  //
4469  // Set the Rising Edge Delay input
4470  //
4471  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4472  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~(1U << (EPWM_DBCTL_IN_MODE_S + 1U))) |
4473  (input << (EPWM_DBCTL_IN_MODE_S + 1U)));
4474  }
4475 }
4476 //*****************************************************************************
4477 //
4493 //
4494 //*****************************************************************************
4495 __attribute__((always_inline))
4496 static inline void
4497 EPWM_setDeadBandControlShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
4498  EPWM_DeadBandControlLoadMode loadMode)
4499 {
4500  //
4501  // Check the arguments
4502  //
4503  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4504 
4505  //
4506  // Enable the shadow mode and setup the load event
4507  //
4508  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL2) =
4509  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL2) & ~EPWM_DBCTL2_LOADDBCTLMODE_M) |
4510  (EPWM_DBCTL2_SHDWDBCTLMODE | (uint16_t)loadMode));
4511 }
4512 //*****************************************************************************
4513 //
4522 //
4523 //*****************************************************************************
4524 __attribute__((always_inline))
4525 static inline void
4526 EPWM_disableDeadBandControlShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base)
4527 {
4528  //
4529  // Check the arguments
4530  //
4531  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4532 
4533  //
4534  // Disable the shadow load mode. Only immediate load mode only.
4535  //
4536  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL2) =
4537  (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL2) & ~EPWM_DBCTL2_SHDWDBCTLMODE);
4538 }
4539 //*****************************************************************************
4540 //
4555 //
4556 //*****************************************************************************
4557 __attribute__((always_inline))
4558 static inline void
4559 EPWM_setRisingEdgeDelayCountShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
4560  EPWM_RisingEdgeDelayLoadMode loadMode)
4561 {
4562  //
4563  // Check the arguments
4564  //
4565  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4566 
4567  //
4568  // Enable the shadow mode. Set-up the load mode
4569  //
4570  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4571  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~EPWM_DBCTL_LOADREDMODE_M) |
4572  ((uint16_t)EPWM_DBCTL_SHDWDBREDMODE |
4573  ((uint16_t)loadMode << EPWM_DBCTL_LOADREDMODE_S)));
4574 
4575 }
4576 //*****************************************************************************
4577 //
4585 //
4586 //*****************************************************************************
4587 __attribute__((always_inline))
4588 static inline void
4589 EPWM_disableRisingEdgeDelayCountShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base)
4590 {
4591  //
4592  // Check the arguments
4593  //
4594  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4595 
4596  //
4597  // Disable the shadow mode.
4598  //
4599  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4600  (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~EPWM_DBCTL_SHDWDBREDMODE);
4601 
4602 }
4603 //*****************************************************************************
4604 //
4619 //
4620 //*****************************************************************************
4621 __attribute__((always_inline))
4622 static inline void
4623 EPWM_setFallingEdgeDelayCountShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
4624  EPWM_FallingEdgeDelayLoadMode loadMode)
4625 {
4626  //
4627  // Check the arguments
4628  //
4629  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4630 
4631  //
4632  // Enable the shadow mode. Setup the load mode.
4633  //
4634  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4635  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~EPWM_DBCTL_LOADFEDMODE_M) |
4636  (EPWM_DBCTL_SHDWDBFEDMODE |
4637  ((uint16_t)loadMode << EPWM_DBCTL_LOADFEDMODE_S)));
4638 
4639 }
4640 //*****************************************************************************
4641 //
4650 //
4651 //*****************************************************************************
4652 __attribute__((always_inline))
4653 static inline void
4654 EPWM_disableFallingEdgeDelayCountShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base)
4655 {
4656  //
4657  // Check the arguments
4658  //
4659  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4660 
4661  //
4662  // Disable the shadow mode.
4663  //
4664  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4665  (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~EPWM_DBCTL_SHDWDBFEDMODE);
4666 }
4667 //*****************************************************************************
4668 //
4683 //
4684 //*****************************************************************************
4685 __attribute__((always_inline))
4686 static inline void
4687 EPWM_setDeadBandCounterClock(uint32_t base,
4688  EPWM_DeadBandClockMode clockMode)
4689 {
4690  //
4691  // Check the arguments
4692  //
4693  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4694 
4695  //
4696  // Set the DB clock mode
4697  //
4698  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) =
4699  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~EPWM_DBCTL_HALFCYCLE) |
4700  ((uint16_t)clockMode << 15U));
4701 }
4702 //*****************************************************************************
4703 //
4713 //
4714 //*****************************************************************************
4715 __attribute__((always_inline))
4716 static inline void
4717 EPWM_setRisingEdgeDelayCount(uint32_t base, uint16_t redCount)
4718 {
4719  //
4720  // Check the arguments
4721  //
4722  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4723  ASSERT(redCount < 0x4000U);
4724 
4725  //
4726  // Set the RED (Rising Edge Delay) count
4727  //
4728  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBRED) = redCount;
4729 }
4730 //*****************************************************************************
4731 //
4741 //
4742 //*****************************************************************************
4743 __attribute__((always_inline))
4744 static inline void
4745 EPWM_setFallingEdgeDelayCount(uint32_t base, uint16_t fedCount)
4746 {
4747  //
4748  // Check the arguments
4749  //
4750  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4751  ASSERT(fedCount < 0x4000U);
4752 
4753  //
4754  // Set the RED (Rising Edge Delay) count
4755  //
4756  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBFED) = fedCount;
4757 }
4758 //
4759 // Chopper module related APIs
4760 //
4761 //*****************************************************************************
4762 //
4770 //
4771 //*****************************************************************************
4772 __attribute__((always_inline))
4773 static inline void
4774 EPWM_enableChopper(uint32_t base)
4775 {
4776  //
4777  // Check the arguments
4778  //
4779  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4780 
4781  //
4782  // Set CHPEN bit. Enable Chopper
4783  //
4784  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) |= EPWM_PCCTL_CHPEN;
4785 }
4786 //*****************************************************************************
4787 //
4795 //
4796 //*****************************************************************************
4797 __attribute__((always_inline))
4798 static inline void
4799 EPWM_disableChopper(uint32_t base)
4800 {
4801  //
4802  // Check the arguments
4803  //
4804  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4805 
4806  //
4807  // Clear CHPEN bit. Disable Chopper
4808  //
4809  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) &= ~EPWM_PCCTL_CHPEN;
4810 }
4811 //*****************************************************************************
4812 //
4824 //
4825 //*****************************************************************************
4826 __attribute__((always_inline))
4827 static inline void
4828 EPWM_setChopperDutyCycle(uint32_t base, uint16_t dutyCycleCount)
4829 {
4830  //
4831  // Check the arguments
4832  //
4833  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4834  ASSERT(dutyCycleCount < 7U);
4835 
4836  //
4837  // Set the chopper duty cycle
4838  //
4839  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) =
4840  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) & ~EPWM_PCCTL_CHPDUTY_M) |
4841  (dutyCycleCount << EPWM_PCCTL_CHPDUTY_S));
4842 }
4843 //*****************************************************************************
4844 //
4856 //
4857 //*****************************************************************************
4858 __attribute__((always_inline))
4859 static inline void
4860 EPWM_setChopperFreq(uint32_t base, uint16_t freqDiv)
4861 {
4862  //
4863  // Check the arguments
4864  //
4865  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4866  ASSERT(freqDiv < 8U);
4867 
4868  //
4869  // Set the chopper clock
4870  //
4871  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) =
4872  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) &
4873  ~(uint16_t)EPWM_PCCTL_CHPFREQ_M) |
4874  (freqDiv << EPWM_PCCTL_CHPFREQ_S));
4875 }
4876 //*****************************************************************************
4877 //
4889 //
4890 //*****************************************************************************
4891 __attribute__((always_inline))
4892 static inline void
4893 EPWM_setChopperFirstPulseWidth(uint32_t base, uint16_t firstPulseWidth)
4894 {
4895  //
4896  // Check the arguments
4897  //
4898  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4899  ASSERT(firstPulseWidth < 16U);
4900 
4901  //
4902  // Set the chopper clock
4903  //
4904  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) =
4905  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_PCCTL) &
4906  ~(uint16_t)EPWM_PCCTL_OSHTWTH_M) |
4907  (firstPulseWidth << EPWM_PCCTL_OSHTWTH_S));
4908 }
4909 //
4910 // Trip Zone module related APIs
4911 //
4912 //*****************************************************************************
4913 //
4943 //
4944 //*****************************************************************************
4945 __attribute__((always_inline))
4946 static inline void
4947 EPWM_enableTripZoneSignals(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzSignal)
4948 {
4949  //
4950  // Check the arguments
4951  //
4952  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4953 
4954  //
4955  // Set the trip zone bits
4956  //
4957 
4958  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZSEL) |= tzSignal;
4959 
4960 }
4961 //*****************************************************************************
4962 //
4992 //
4993 //*****************************************************************************
4994 __attribute__((always_inline))
4995 static inline void
4996 EPWM_disableTripZoneSignals(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzSignal)
4997 {
4998  //
4999  // Check the arguments
5000  //
5001  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5002 
5003  //
5004  // Clear the trip zone bits
5005  //
5006 
5007  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZSEL) &= ~tzSignal;
5008 
5009 }
5010 //*****************************************************************************
5011 //
5040 //
5041 //*****************************************************************************
5042 __attribute__((always_inline))
5043 static inline void
5044 EPWM_setTripZoneDigitalCompareEventCondition(uint32_t base,
5045  EPWM_TripZoneDigitalCompareOutput dcType,
5046  EPWM_TripZoneDigitalCompareOutputEvent dcEvent)
5047 {
5048  //
5049  // Check the arguments
5050  //
5051  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5052 
5053  //
5054  // Set Digital Compare Events conditions that cause a Digital Compare trip
5055  //
5056 
5057  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZDCSEL) =
5058  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZDCSEL) & ~(0x7U << (uint16_t)dcType)) |
5059  ((uint16_t)dcEvent << (uint16_t)dcType));
5060 
5061 }
5062 
5063 //*****************************************************************************
5064 //
5074 //
5075 //*****************************************************************************
5076 __attribute__((always_inline))
5077 static inline void
5078 EPWM_enableTripZoneAdvAction(uint32_t base)
5079 {
5080  //
5081  // Check the arguments
5082  //
5083  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5084 
5085  //
5086  // Enable Advanced feature. Set ETZE bit
5087  //
5088 
5089  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) |= EPWM_TZCTL2_ETZE;
5090 
5091 }
5092 //*****************************************************************************
5093 //
5101 //
5102 //*****************************************************************************
5103 __attribute__((always_inline))
5104 static inline void
5105 EPWM_disableTripZoneAdvAction(uint32_t base)
5106 {
5107  //
5108  // Check the arguments
5109  //
5110  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5111 
5112  //
5113  // Disable Advanced feature. clear ETZE bit
5114  //
5115 
5116  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) &= ~EPWM_TZCTL2_ETZE;
5117 
5118 }
5119 //*****************************************************************************
5120 //
5149 //
5150 //*****************************************************************************
5151 __attribute__((always_inline))
5152 static inline void
5153 EPWM_setTripZoneAction(uint32_t base, EPWM_TripZoneEvent tzEvent,
5154  EPWM_TripZoneAction tzAction)
5155 {
5156  //
5157  // Check the arguments
5158  //
5159  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5160 
5161  //
5162  // Set the Action for Trip Zone events
5163  //
5164 
5165  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL) =
5166  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL) & ~(0x3U << (uint16_t)tzEvent)) |
5167  ((uint16_t)tzAction << (uint16_t)tzEvent)) ;
5168 
5169 }
5170 //*****************************************************************************
5171 //
5206 //
5207 //*****************************************************************************
5208 __attribute__((always_inline))
5209 static inline void
5210 EPWM_setTripZoneAdvAction(uint32_t base, EPWM_TripZoneAdvancedEvent tzAdvEvent,
5211  EPWM_TripZoneAdvancedAction tzAdvAction)
5212 {
5213  //
5214  // Check the arguments
5215  //
5216  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5217 
5218  //
5219  // Set the Advanced Action for Trip Zone events
5220  //
5221 
5222  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) =
5223  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) & ~(0x7U << (uint16_t)tzAdvEvent)) |
5224  ((uint16_t)tzAdvAction << (uint16_t)tzAdvEvent));
5225 
5226  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) |= EPWM_TZCTL2_ETZE;
5227 
5228 }
5229 //*****************************************************************************
5230 //
5262 //
5263 //*****************************************************************************

5268  EPWM_TripZoneAdvancedAction tzAdvDCAction)

5276  // Set the Advanced Action for Trip Zone events
5277  //
5278 
5279  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTLDCA) =
5280  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTLDCA) & ~(0x7U << (uint16_t)tzAdvDCEvent)) |
5281  ((uint16_t)tzAdvDCAction << (uint16_t)tzAdvDCEvent));
5282 
5283  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) |= EPWM_TZCTL2_ETZE;
5284 
5285 }
5286 //*****************************************************************************

5319 //

5322 static inline void EPWM_setTripZoneAdvDigitalCompareActionB(uint32_t base,
5323  EPWM_TripZoneAdvDigitalCompareEvent tzAdvDCEvent,
5324  EPWM_TripZoneAdvancedAction tzAdvDCAction)

5333  //

5336  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTLDCB) & ~(0x7U << (uint16_t)tzAdvDCEvent)) |
5337  ((uint16_t)tzAdvDCAction << (uint16_t)tzAdvDCEvent));
5338

5341 }
5342 //*****************************************************************************
5343 //
5363 //
5364 //*****************************************************************************
5365 __attribute__((always_inline))
5366 static inline void
5367 EPWM_enableTripZoneInterrupt(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzInterrupt)
5368 {
5369  //
5370  // Check the arguments
5371  //
5372  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5373  ASSERT((tzInterrupt > 0U) && (tzInterrupt <= 0x80U));
5374 
5375  //
5376  // Enable Trip zone interrupts
5377  //
5378 
5379  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZEINT) |= tzInterrupt;
5380 
5381 }
5382 //*****************************************************************************
5383 //
5403 //
5404 //***************************************************************************
5405 __attribute__((always_inline))
5406 static inline void
5407 EPWM_disableTripZoneInterrupt(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzInterrupt)
5408 {
5409  //
5410  // Check the arguments
5411  //
5412  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5413  ASSERT((tzInterrupt > 0U) && (tzInterrupt <= 0x80U));
5414 
5415  //
5416  // Disable Trip zone interrupts
5417  //
5418 
5419  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZEINT) &= ~tzInterrupt;
5420 
5421 }
5422 //*****************************************************************************
5423 //
5441 //
5442 //***************************************************************************
5443 __attribute__((always_inline))
5444 static inline uint16_t
5445 EPWM_getTripZoneFlagStatus(uint32_t base)
5446 {
5447  //
5448  // Check the arguments
5449  //
5450  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5451 
5452  //
5453  // Return the Trip zone flag status
5454  //
5455  return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZFLG) & 0xFFU);
5456 }
5457 //*****************************************************************************
5458 //

5482 static inline uint16_t
5483 EPWM_getCycleByCycleTripZoneFlagStatus(uint32_t base)
5484 {

5487  //
5488  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5489 
5490  //
5491  // Return the Cycle By Cycle Trip zone flag status
5492  //
5493  return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCBCFLG) & 0x1FFU);
5494 }

5520 EPWM_getOneShotTripZoneFlagStatus(uint32_t base)
5521 {
