5526 
5527  //
5528  // Return the One Shot Trip zone flag status
5529  //
5530  return(HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZOSTFLG) & 0x1FFU);
5531 }
5532 //*****************************************************************************
5533 //
5550 //
5551 //**************************************************************************
5552 __attribute__((always_inline))
5553 static inline void
5554 EPWM_selectCycleByCycleTripZoneClearEvent(uint32_t base,
5555  EPWM_CycleByCycleTripZoneClearMode clearEvent)
5556 {
5557  //
5558  // Check the arguments
5559  //
5560  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5561 
5562  //
5563  // Set the Cycle by Cycle Trip Latch mode
5564  //
5565 
5566  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCLR) =
5567  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCLR) & ~EPWM_TZCLR_CBCPULSE_M) |
5568  ((uint16_t)clearEvent << EPWM_TZCLR_CBCPULSE_S));
5569 
5570 }
5571 //*****************************************************************************
5572 //
5593 //
5594 //***************************************************************************
5595 __attribute__((always_inline))
5596 static inline void
5597 EPWM_clearTripZoneFlag(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzFlags)
5598 {
5599  //
5600  // Check the arguments
5601  //
5602  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5603  ASSERT(tzFlags <= 0x80U);
5604 
5605  //
5606  // Clear Trip zone event fag
5607  //
5608 
5609  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCLR) |= tzFlags;
5610 
5611 }
5612 //*****************************************************************************
5613 //
5634 //
5635 //***************************************************************************
5636 __attribute__((always_inline))
5637 static inline void
5638 EPWM_clearCycleByCycleTripZoneFlag(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzCBCFlags)
5639 {
5640  //
5641  // Check the arguments
5642  //
5643  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5644  ASSERT(tzCBCFlags < 0x800U);
5645 
5646  //
5647  // Clear the Cycle By Cycle Trip zone flag
5648  //
5649 
5650  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCBCCLR) |= tzCBCFlags;
5651 
5652 }
5653 //*****************************************************************************
5654 //
5673 //
5674 //***************************************************************************
5675 __attribute__((always_inline))
5676 static inline void
5677 EPWM_clearOneShotTripZoneFlag(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzOSTFlags)
5678 {
5679  //
5680  // Check the arguments
5681  //
5682  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5683  ASSERT(tzOSTFlags < 0x800U);
5684 
5685  //
5686  // Clear the Cycle By Cycle Trip zone flag
5687  //
5688 
5689  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZOSTCLR) |= tzOSTFlags;
5690 
5691 }
5692 //*****************************************************************************
5693 //
5710 //
5711 //***************************************************************************
5712 __attribute__((always_inline))
5713 static inline void
5714 EPWM_forceTripZoneEvent(uint32_t base, uint16_t tzForceEvent)
5715 {
5716  //
5717  // Check the arguments
5718  //
5719  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5720  ASSERT((tzForceEvent & 0xFF81U) == 0U);
5721 
5722  //
5723  // Force a Trip Zone event
5724  //
5725 
5726  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZFRC) |= tzForceEvent;
5727 
5728 }
5729 //*****************************************************************************
5730 //
5747 //
5748 //***************************************************************************
5749 __attribute__((always_inline))
5750 static inline void
5751 EPWM_enableTripOutSource(uint32_t base, EPWM_selectTripOutSource tzTripOut)
5752 {
5753  //
5754  // Check the arguments
5755  //
5756  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5757 
5758  //
5759  // Configures the TRIPOUT source
5760  //
5761 
5762  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZTRIPOUTSEL) |= 1U << (uint32_t)tzTripOut;
5763 
5764 }
5765 //*****************************************************************************
5766 //
5783 //
5784 //***************************************************************************
5785 __attribute__((always_inline))
5786 static inline void
5787 EPWM_disableTripOutSource(uint32_t base, EPWM_selectTripOutSource tzTripOut)
5788 {
5789  //
5790  // Check the arguments
5791  //
5792  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5793 
5794  //
5795  // Disables the TRIPOUT source
5796  //
5797 
5798  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZTRIPOUTSEL) &= ~(1U << (uint32_t)tzTripOut);
5799 
5800 }
5801 //
5802 // Event Trigger related APIs
5803 //
5804 //*****************************************************************************
5805 //
5813 //
5814 //*****************************************************************************
5815 __attribute__((always_inline))
5816 static inline void
5817 EPWM_enableInterrupt(uint32_t base)
5818 {
5819  //
5820  // Check the arguments
5821  //
5822  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5823 
5824  //
5825  // Enable ePWM interrupt
5826  //
5827  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_INTEN;
5828 }
5829 //*****************************************************************************
5830 //
5838 //
5839 //*****************************************************************************
5840 __attribute__((always_inline))
5841 static inline void
5842 EPWM_disableInterrupt(uint32_t base)
5843 {
5844  //
5845  // Check the arguments
5846  //
5847  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5848 
5849  //
5850  // Disable ePWM interrupt
5851  //
5852  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_INTEN;
5853 }
5854 //*****************************************************************************
5855 //
5880 //
5881 //*****************************************************************************
5882 __attribute__((always_inline))
5883 static inline void
5884 EPWM_setInterruptSource(uint32_t base, uint16_t interruptSource)
5885 {
5886  uint16_t intSource;
5887 
5888  //
5889  // Check the arguments
5890  //
5891  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5892  ASSERT(((interruptSource > 0U) && (interruptSource < 9U)) ||
5893  (interruptSource == 10U) || (interruptSource == 12U) ||
5894  (interruptSource == 14U));
5895 
5896  if((interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_U_CMPC) ||
5897  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_U_CMPD) ||
5898  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_D_CMPC) ||
5899  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_D_CMPD))
5900  {
5901  //
5902  // Shift the interrupt source by 1
5903  //
5904  intSource = interruptSource >> 1U;
5905 
5906  //
5907  // Enable events based on comp C or comp D
5908  //
5909  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_INTSELCMP;
5910  }
5911  else if((interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_U_CMPA) ||
5912  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_U_CMPB) ||
5913  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_D_CMPA) ||
5914  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_D_CMPB))
5915  {
5916  intSource = interruptSource;
5917 
5918  //
5919  // Enable events based on comp A or comp B
5920  //
5921  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_INTSELCMP;
5922  }
5923  else
5924  {
5925  intSource = interruptSource;
5926  }
5927 
5928  //
5929  // Set the interrupt source
5930  //
5931  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) =
5932  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) & ~EPWM_ETSEL_INTSEL_M) | intSource);
5933 }
5934 //*****************************************************************************
5935 //
5946 //
5947 //*****************************************************************************
5948 __attribute__((always_inline))
5949 static inline void
5950 EPWM_setInterruptEventCount(uint32_t base, uint16_t eventCount)
5951 {
5952  //
5953  // Check the arguments
5954  //
5955  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5956  ASSERT(eventCount < 16U);
5957 
5958  //
5959  // Enable advanced feature of interrupt every up to 15 events
5960  //
5961  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETPS) |= EPWM_ETPS_INTPSSEL;
5962  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETINTPS) =
5963  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETINTPS) & ~EPWM_ETINTPS_INTPRD2_M) |
5964  eventCount);
5965 }
5966 //*****************************************************************************
5967 //
5977 //
5978 //*****************************************************************************
5979 __attribute__((always_inline))
5980 static inline bool
5981 EPWM_getEventTriggerInterruptStatus(uint32_t base)
5982 {
5983  //
5984  // Check the arguments
5985  //
5986  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5987 
5988  //
5989  // Return INT bit of ETFLG register
5990  //
5991  return(((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETFLG) & 0x1U) == 0x1U));
5992 }
5993 //*****************************************************************************
5994 //
6002 //
6003 //*****************************************************************************
6004 __attribute__((always_inline))
6005 static inline void
6006 EPWM_clearEventTriggerInterruptFlag(uint32_t base)
6007 {
6008  //
6009  // Check the arguments
6010  //
6011  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6012 
6013  //
6014  // Clear INT bit of ETCLR register
6015  //
6016  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCLR) |= EPWM_ETCLR_INT;
6017 }
6018 //*****************************************************************************
6019 //
6030 //
6031 //*****************************************************************************
6032 __attribute__((always_inline))
6033 static inline void
6034 EPWM_enableInterruptEventCountInit(uint32_t base)
6035 {
6036  //
6037  // Check the arguments
6038  //
6039  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6040 
6041  //
6042  // Enable interrupt event count initializing/loading
6043  //
6044  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) |= EPWM_ETCNTINITCTL_INTINITEN;
6045 }
6046 //*****************************************************************************
6047 //
6056 //
6057 //*****************************************************************************
6058 __attribute__((always_inline))
6059 static inline void
6060 EPWM_disableInterruptEventCountInit(uint32_t base)
6061 {
6062  //
6063  // Check the arguments
6064  //
6065  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6066 
6067  //
6068  // Disable interrupt event count initializing/loading
6069  //
6070  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) &= ~EPWM_ETCNTINITCTL_INTINITEN;
6071 }
6072 //*****************************************************************************
6073 //
6085 //
6086 //*****************************************************************************
6087 __attribute__((always_inline))
6088 static inline void
6089 EPWM_forceInterruptEventCountInit(uint32_t base)
6090 {
6091  //
6092  // Check the arguments
6093  //
6094  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6095 
6096  //
6097  // Load the Interrupt Event counter value
6098  //
6099  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) |= EPWM_ETCNTINITCTL_INTINITFRC;
6100 }
6101 //*****************************************************************************
6102 //
6113 //
6114 //*****************************************************************************
6115 __attribute__((always_inline))
6116 static inline void
6117 EPWM_setInterruptEventCountInitValue(uint32_t base, uint16_t eventCount)
6118 {
6119  //
6120  // Check the arguments
6121  //
6122  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6123  ASSERT(eventCount < 16U);
6124 
6125  //
6126  // Set the Pre-interrupt event count
6127  //
6128  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) =
6129  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) & ~EPWM_ETCNTINIT_INTINIT_M) |
6130  (uint16_t)(eventCount & 0xFU)); // why 0xFU?
6131 }
6132 //*****************************************************************************
6133 //
6141 //
6142 //*****************************************************************************
6143 __attribute__((always_inline))
6144 static inline uint16_t
6145 EPWM_getInterruptEventCount(uint32_t base)
6146 {
6147  //
6148  // Check the arguments
6149  //
6150  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6151 
6152  //
6153  // Return the interrupt event count
6154  //
6155  return(((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETINTPS) & EPWM_ETINTPS_INTCNT2_M) >>
6156  EPWM_ETINTPS_INTCNT2_S));
6157 }
6158 //*****************************************************************************
6159 //
6167 //
6168 //*****************************************************************************
6169 __attribute__((always_inline))
6170 static inline void
6171 EPWM_forceEventTriggerInterrupt(uint32_t base)
6172 {
6173  //
6174  // Check the arguments
6175  //
6176  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6177 
6178  //
6179  // Set INT bit of ETFRC register
6180  //
6181  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETFRC) |= EPWM_ETFRC_INT;
6182 }
6183 //*****************************************************************************
6184 //
6211 //
6212 //*****************************************************************************
6213 __attribute__((always_inline))
6214 static inline void
6215 EPWM_setMixEvtTriggerSource(uint32_t base, EPWM_ETMixSignalSelect etmixSignal,
6216  EPWM_ETMixTriggerSource interruptSource)
6217 {
6218  uint32_t registerOffset;
6219 
6220  //
6221  // Check the arguments
6222  //
6223  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6224  ASSERT((uint32_t)interruptSource < 11U);
6225 
6226  registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_ETINTMIXEN + (uint32_t)etmixSignal * 2U;
6227 
6228  //
6229  // Set the ETMIX source
6230  //
6231  HWREGH(registerOffset) |= 1U << (uint32_t)interruptSource;
6232 }
6233 //
6234 // ADC SOC configuration related APIs
6235 //
6236 //*****************************************************************************
6237 //
6249 //
6250 //*****************************************************************************
6251 __attribute__((always_inline))
6252 static inline void
6253 EPWM_enableADCTrigger(uint32_t base, EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6254 {
6255  //
6256  // Check the arguments
6257  //
6258  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6259 
6260  //
6261  // Enable an SOC
6262  //
6263  if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6264  {
6265  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_SOCAEN;
6266  }
6267  else
6268  {
6269  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBEN;
6270  }
6271 }
6272 //*****************************************************************************
6273 //
6285 //
6286 //*****************************************************************************
6287 __attribute__((always_inline))
6288 static inline void
6289 EPWM_disableADCTrigger(uint32_t base, EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6290 {
6291  //
6292  // Check the arguments
6293  //
6294  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6295 
6296  //
6297  // Disable an SOC
6298  //
6299  if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6300  {
6301  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCAEN;
6302  }
6303  else
6304  {
6305  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBEN;
6306  }
6307 }
6308 //*****************************************************************************
6309 //
6337 //
6338 //*****************************************************************************
6339 __attribute__((always_inline))
6340 static inline void
6341 EPWM_setADCTriggerSource(uint32_t base,
6342  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType,
6343  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionSource socSource)
6344 {
6345  uint16_t source;
6346 
6347  //
6348  // Check the arguments
6349  //
6350  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6351 
6352  if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPC) ||
6353  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPD) ||
6354  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPC) ||
6355  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPD))
6356  {
6357  source = (uint16_t)socSource >> 1U;
6358  }
6359  else
6360  {
6361  source = (uint16_t)socSource;
6362  }
6363 
6364  if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6365  {
6366  //
6367  // Set the SOC source
6368  //
6369  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) =
6370  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) & ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCASEL_M) |
6371  (source << EPWM_ETSEL_SOCASEL_S));
6372 
6373  //
6374  // Enable the comparator selection
6375  //
6376  if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPA) ||
6377  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPB) ||
6378  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPA) ||
6379  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPB))
6380  {
6381  //
6382  // Enable events based on comp A or comp B
6383  //
6384  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCASELCMP;
6385  }
6386  else if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPC) ||
6387  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPD) ||
6388  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPC) ||
6389  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPD))
6390  {
6391  //
6392  // Enable events based on comp C or comp D
6393  //
6394  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_SOCASELCMP;
6395  }
6396  else
6397  {
6398  //
6399  // No action required for the other socSource options
6400  //
6401  }
6402  }
6403  else
6404  {
6405  //
6406  // Enable the comparator selection
6407  //
6408  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) =
6409  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) & ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBSEL_M) |
6410  (source << EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBSEL_S));
6411 
6412  //
6413  // Enable the comparator selection
6414  //
6415  if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPA) ||
6416  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPB) ||
6417  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPA) ||
6418  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPB))
6419  {
6420  //
6421  // Enable events based on comp A or comp B
6422  //
6423  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBSELCMP;
6424  }
6425  else if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPC) ||
6426  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPD) ||
6427  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPC) ||
6428  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPD))
6429  {
6430  //
6431  // Enable events based on comp C or comp D
6432  //
6433  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBSELCMP;
6434  }
6435  else
6436  {
6437  //
6438  // No action required for the other socSource options
6439  //
6440  }
6441  }
6442 }
6443 //*****************************************************************************
6444 //
6464 //
6465 //*****************************************************************************
6466 __attribute__((always_inline))
6467 static inline void
6468 EPWM_setADCTriggerEventPrescale(uint32_t base,
6469  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType,
6470  uint16_t preScaleCount)
6471 {
6472  //
6473  // Check the arguments
6474  //
6475  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6476  ASSERT(preScaleCount < 16U);
6477 
6478  //
6479  // Enable advanced feature of SOC every up to 15 events
6480  //
6481  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETPS) |= EPWM_ETPS_SOCPSSEL;
6482  if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6483  {
6484  //
6485  // Set the count for SOC A
6486  //
6487  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) =
6488  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) & ~EPWM_ETSOCPS_SOCAPRD2_M) |
6489  preScaleCount);
6490  }
6491  else
6492  {
6493  //
6494  // Set the count for SOC B
6495  //
6496  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) =
6497  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) & ~EPWM_ETSOCPS_SOCBPRD2_M) |
6498  (preScaleCount << EPWM_ETSOCPS_SOCBPRD2_S));
6499  }
6500 }
6501 //*****************************************************************************
6502 //
6515 //
6516 //*****************************************************************************
6517 __attribute__((always_inline))
6518 static inline bool
6519 EPWM_getADCTriggerFlagStatus(uint32_t base,
6520  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6521 {
6522  //
6523  // Check the arguments
6524  //
6525  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6526 
6527  //
6528  // Return the SOC A/ B status
6529  //
6530  return((((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETFLG) >>
6531  ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 2U)) & 0x1U) == 0x1U));
6532 }
6533 //*****************************************************************************
6534 //
6546 //
6547 //*****************************************************************************
6548 __attribute__((always_inline))
6549 static inline void
6550 EPWM_clearADCTriggerFlag(uint32_t base,
6551  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6552 {
6553  //
6554  // Check the arguments
6555  //
6556  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6557 
6558  //
6559  // Clear SOC A/B bit of ETCLR register
6560  //
6561  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCLR) |= 1U << ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 2U);
6562 }
6563 //*****************************************************************************
6564 //
6580 //
6581 //*****************************************************************************
6582 __attribute__((always_inline))
6583 static inline void
6584 EPWM_enableADCTriggerEventCountInit(uint32_t base,
6585  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6586 {
6587  //
6588  // Check the arguments
6589  //
6590  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6591 
6592  //
6593  // Enable SOC event count initializing/loading
6594  //
6595  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) |= 1U << ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 14U);
6596 }
6597 //*****************************************************************************
6598 //
6613 //
6614 //*****************************************************************************
6615 __attribute__((always_inline))
6616 static inline void
6617 EPWM_disableADCTriggerEventCountInit(uint32_t base,
6618  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6619 {
6620  //
6621  // Check the arguments
6622  //
6623  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6624 
6625  //
6626  // Disable SOC event count initializing/loading
6627  //
6628  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) &=
6629  ~(1U << ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 14U));
6630 }
6631 //*****************************************************************************
6632 //
6645 //
6646 //*****************************************************************************
6647 __attribute__((always_inline))
6648 static inline void
6649 EPWM_forceADCTriggerEventCountInit(uint32_t base,
6650  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6651 {
6652  //
6653  // Check the arguments
6654  //
6655  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6656 
6657  //
6658  // Load the Interrupt Event counter value
6659  //
6660  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINITCTL) |= 1U << ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 11U);
6661 }
6662 
6663 //*****************************************************************************
6664 //
6678 //
6679 //*****************************************************************************
6680 __attribute__((always_inline))
6681 static inline void
6682 EPWM_setADCTriggerEventCountInitValue(uint32_t base,
6683  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType,
6684  uint16_t eventCount)
6685 {
6686  //
6687  // Check the arguments
6688  //
6689  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6690  ASSERT(eventCount < 16U);
6691 
6692  //
6693  // Set the ADC Trigger event count
6694  //
6695  if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6696  {
6697  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) =
6698  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) & ~EPWM_ETCNTINIT_SOCAINIT_M) |
6699  (uint16_t)(eventCount << EPWM_ETCNTINIT_SOCAINIT_S));
6700  }
6701  else
6702  {
6703  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) =
6704  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) & ~EPWM_ETCNTINIT_SOCBINIT_M) |
6705  (eventCount << EPWM_ETCNTINIT_SOCBINIT_S));
6706  }
6707 }
6708 //*****************************************************************************
6709 //
6721 //
6722 //*****************************************************************************
6723 __attribute__((always_inline))
6724 static inline uint16_t
6725 EPWM_getADCTriggerEventCount(uint32_t base,
6726  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6727 {
6728  uint16_t eventCount;
6729 
6730  //
6731  // Check the arguments
6732  //
6733  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6734 
6735  //
6736  // Return the SOC event count
6737  //
6738  if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
6739  {
6740  eventCount = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) >>
6741  EPWM_ETSOCPS_SOCACNT2_S) & 0xFU;
6742  }
6743  else
6744  {
6745  eventCount = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) >>
6746  EPWM_ETSOCPS_SOCBCNT2_S) & 0xFU;
6747  }
6748  return(eventCount);
6749 }
6750 //*****************************************************************************
6751 //
6763 //
6764 //*****************************************************************************
6765 __attribute__((always_inline))
6766 static inline void
6767 EPWM_forceADCTrigger(uint32_t base, EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
6768 {
6769  //
6770  // Check the arguments
6771  //
6772  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6773 
6774  //
6775  // Set SOC A/B bit of ETFRC register
6776  //
6777  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETFRC) |= 1U << ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 2U);
6778 }
6779 //
6780 // Digital Compare module related APIs
6781 //
6782 //*****************************************************************************
6783 //
6805 //
6806 //*****************************************************************************
6807 __attribute__((always_inline))
6808 static inline void
6809 EPWM_selectDigitalCompareTripInput(uint32_t base,
6810  EPWM_DigitalCompareTripInput tripSource,
6811  EPWM_DigitalCompareType dcType)
6812 {
6813  //
6814  // Check the arguments
6815  //
6816  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6817 
6818  //
6819  // Set the DC trip input
6820  //
6821 
6822  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCTRIPSEL) =
6823  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCTRIPSEL) & ~(0xFU << ((uint16_t)dcType << 2U))) |
6824  ((uint16_t)tripSource << ((uint16_t)dcType << 2U)));
6825 
6826 }
6827 //
6828 // DCFILT
6829 //
6830 //*****************************************************************************
6831 //
6839 //
6840 //*****************************************************************************
6841 __attribute__((always_inline))
6842 static inline void
6843 EPWM_enableDigitalCompareBlankingWindow(uint32_t base)
6844 {
6845  //
6846  // Check the arguments
6847  //
6848  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6849 
6850  //
6851  // Enable DC filter blanking window
6852  //
6853 
6854  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) |= EPWM_DCFCTL_BLANKE;
6855 
6856 }
6857 //*****************************************************************************
6858 //
6866 //
6867 //*****************************************************************************
6868 __attribute__((always_inline))
6869 static inline void
6870 EPWM_disableDigitalCompareBlankingWindow(uint32_t base)
6871 {
6872  //
6873  // Check the arguments
6874  //
6875  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6876 
6877  //
6878  // Disable DC filter blanking window
6879  //
6880 
6881  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) &= ~EPWM_DCFCTL_BLANKE;
6882 
6883 }
6884 //*****************************************************************************
6885 //

6895 //*****************************************************************************

6897 static inline void
6898 EPWM_enableDigitalCompareWindowInverseMode(uint32_t base)
6899 {
6900  //
6901  // Check the arguments
6902  //
6903  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6904 
6905  //
6906  // Enable DC window inverse mode.
6907  //
6908 
6909  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) |= EPWM_DCFCTL_BLANKINV;
6910 
6911 }
6912 //*****************************************************************************
6913 //

6922 //*****************************************************************************

6924 static inline void
6925 EPWM_disableDigitalCompareWindowInverseMode(uint32_t base)
6926 {
6927  //
6928  // Check the arguments
6929  //
6930  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6931 
6932  //
6933  // Disable DC window inverse mode.
6934  //
6935 
6936  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) &= ~EPWM_DCFCTL_BLANKINV;
6937 
6938 }
6939 //*****************************************************************************
6940 //
6956 //
6957 //*****************************************************************************
6958 __attribute__((always_inline))
6959 static inline void
6960 EPWM_setDigitalCompareBlankingEvent(uint32_t base,
6961  EPWM_DigitalCompareBlankingPulse blankingPulse)
6962 {
6963  //
6964  // Check the arguments
6965  //
6966  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
6967 
6968  //
6969  // Set DC blanking event
6970  //
6971 
6972  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) =
6973  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) & ~EPWM_DCFCTL_PULSESEL_M) |
6974  ((uint16_t)((uint32_t)blankingPulse << EPWM_DCFCTL_PULSESEL_S)));
6975 
6976 }
6977 //*****************************************************************************
6978 //
6993 //
6994 //*****************************************************************************
6995 __attribute__((always_inline))
6996 static inline void
6997 EPWM_setDigitalCompareFilterInput(uint32_t base,
6998  EPWM_DigitalCompareFilterInput filterInput)
6999 {
7000  //
7001  // Check the arguments
7002  //
7003  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7004 
7005  //
7006  // Set the signal source that will be filtered
7007  //
7008 
7009  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) =
7010  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) & ~EPWM_DCFCTL_SRCSEL_M) |
7011  ((uint16_t)filterInput));
7012 
7013 }
7014 //
7015 // DC Edge Filter
7016 //
7017 //*****************************************************************************
7018 //
7027 //
7028 //*****************************************************************************
7029 __attribute__((always_inline))
7030 static inline void
7031 EPWM_enableDigitalCompareEdgeFilter(uint32_t base)
7032 {
7033  //
7034  // Check the arguments
7035  //
7036  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7037 
7038  //
7039  // Enable DC Edge Filter
7040  //
7041 
7042  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) |= EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGEFILTSEL;
7043 
7044 }
7045 //*****************************************************************************
7046 //
7054 //
7055 //*****************************************************************************
7056 __attribute__((always_inline))
7057 static inline void
7058 EPWM_disableDigitalCompareEdgeFilter(uint32_t base)
7059 {
7060  //
7061  // Check the arguments
7062  //
7063  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7064 
7065  //
7066  // Disable DC Edge Filter
7067  //
7068 
7069  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) &= ~EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGEFILTSEL;
7070 
7071 }
7072 
7073 //*****************************************************************************
7074 //
7087 //
7088 //*****************************************************************************
7089 __attribute__((always_inline))
7090 static inline void
7091 EPWM_setDigitalCompareEdgeFilterMode(uint32_t base,
7092  EPWM_DigitalCompareEdgeFilterMode edgeMode)
7093 {
7094  //
7095  // Check the arguments
7096  //
7097  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7098 
7099  //
7100  // Set DC Edge filter mode
7101  //
7102 
7103  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) =
7104  (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) & ~EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGEMODE_M) |
7105  ((uint16_t)edgeMode << EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGEMODE_S);
7106 
7107 }
7108 
7109 //*****************************************************************************
7110 //
7128 //
7129 //*****************************************************************************
7130 __attribute__((always_inline))
7131 static inline void
7132 EPWM_setDigitalCompareEdgeFilterEdgeCount(uint32_t base, uint16_t edgeCount)
7133 {
7134  //
7135  // Check the arguments
7136  //
7137  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7138 
7139  //
7140  // Set DC Edge filter edge count
7141  //
7142 
7143  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) &
7144  ~EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGECOUNT_M) |
7145  (edgeCount << EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGECOUNT_S);
7146 
7147 }
7148 //*****************************************************************************
7149 //
7158 //
7159 //*****************************************************************************
7160 __attribute__((always_inline))
7161 static inline uint16_t
7162 EPWM_getDigitalCompareEdgeFilterEdgeCount(uint32_t base)
7163 {
7164  //
7165  // Check the arguments
7166  //
7167  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7168 
7169  //
7170  // Return configured DC edge filter edge count
7171  //
7172  return((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) & EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGECOUNT_M) >>
7173  EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGECOUNT_S);
7174 }
7175 //*****************************************************************************
7176 //
7185 //
7186 //*****************************************************************************
7187 __attribute__((always_inline))
7188 static inline uint16_t
7189 EPWM_getDigitalCompareEdgeFilterEdgeStatus(uint32_t base)
7190 {
7191  //
7192  // Check the arguments
7193  //
7194  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7195 
7196  //
7197  // Return captured edge count by DC Edge filter
7198  //
7199  return((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFCTL) & EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGESTATUS_M) >>
7200  EPWM_DCFCTL_EDGESTATUS_S);
7201 }
7202 //*****************************************************************************

7214 //

7217 static inline void
7218 EPWM_setDigitalCompareWindowOffset(uint32_t base, uint16_t windowOffsetCount)
7219 {
7220  //
7221  // Check the arguments
7222  //
7223  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7224 
7225  //
7226  // Set the blanking window offset in TBCLK counts
7227  //
7228  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCFOFFSET) = windowOffsetCount;
7229 }
